long_description: The Sherpak Go! 15 Cartop gear bag easily straps onto your roof rack or bare roof for easy transport of your gear. Heavy-duty, UV-resistant vinyl design features welded seams for weather resistance. Deeply recessed zipper and vinyl storm flap seal out water. Lateral compression straps helps secure your load. Features heavy-duty hardware and accessories. The Sherpak Go! 15 Cartop gear bag can be quickly detached from the rack or car top and easily folded and stored when not in use.
short_description: The Sherpak Go! 15 Cartop gear bag easily straps onto your roof rack or bare roof for easy transport of your gear.
